body.name: Arm & Hammer 4-in-1 Laundry Detergent Power Paks, 58 Count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 5 mins
features: Powerfully clean, naturally fresh: The deep cleaning power of our trusted laundry detergent in a single Power Pak; formulated to get out tough dirt and odors with lasting freshness and deodorizing power of pure Arm & Hammer Baking Soda
4 powerful cleaning benefits: deep cleaning convenient laundry detergent paks attack tough odors, fight set-in stains, protect colors, and freshen with long-lasting scent booster

Microcrystals power away dirt and stains: our laundry soap is specially formulated with unique microcrystals; fast-dissolving Power Paks feature 99% active ingredients to clean away tough dirt, attack odors, and give laundry a boost of Clean Burst fragrance

No measuring, mess or spills: convenient pre-measured Power Paks combine ultra-concentrated laundry detergent in a drop-and-go Power Pak laundry pod; two Power Paks work for large and heavily soiled loads; one Power Pak for regular or lightly soiled loads

Works in all machines and all temperatures: Works in standard and high efficiency (HE) washing machines; dissolve completely in all water temperatures for an ideal cold water laundry detergent; these HE laundry detergent paks deliver a deep clean and fresh scent
body.description: ARM & HAMMER™ 4-in-1 Power Paks combine deep-cleaning detergent with ARM & HAMMER™ baking soda freshness and two powerful enzymes. Our 4-in-1 Power Paks fight stains, attack odors and protect colors to leave your clothes clean with a lasting fresh scent. The fast-dissolve microcrystals attack odors, and blast away tough dirt and set-in stains for a powerful, lasting clean. Get ultra-concentrated cleaning power with ARM & HAMMER™ 4-in-1 Power Paks formulated with 99% active ingredients and designed to work in all temperatures and all machines. Drop one in today

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EXCELLENT for prewash soaking
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this 97 pack for my parents last year who have a front load washer. Mom has Alzheimers and she would forget to use detergent or use the wrong amount in the dispenser.....this was just easier for them to throw in a pack in the tub with the clothes and wash some laundry.I have been going over weekly as they are getting older and needed much more help than I realized. I am not a fan of front load machines so I took 1 of these pods and put it into a gallon of HOT water with a few of their "clean" small items that I was going to throw away. The items were dingy whites and had minor old staining and no odor. I let it soak for a few hours in this bucket and was completely shocked to see the water muddy and filthy dark after an hour of soaking. I need to stress here how filthy dark the water was as I never expected these items were really that dirty. The water looked like I was washing an old pair of brown tennis shoes and completely opaque with grossness. This was my version of prewashing at their house because I don't trust their machine. In any event, I LOVE these pacs. For prewash soaking, they are amazing. If their machine allowed for soaking, I would have used that option, but at least I was able to actually SEE how well these do perform.I used these pacs that day because their subscribe and save order for the odor blaster pods had not come in yet. They like the odor blasters scent too but I could only use what was on hand. So this is just ANOTHER Arm and Hammer product that earns 10 stars. These don't have much of a scent to them that I noticed. When all of their laundry was done, I did not smell anything at all after the dryer. Not sure why these 3rd party sellers offering this now think we will pay any price they are asking.....these are for sale at Big Lots for about $10 for the 97 pack.At my parents' home, their city water is hard with a TDS of 250. 1 pack of this A&H in 1 gallon of hot water makes the water feels slippery without excessive bubbles. If you have hard water, you may need to use 2 packs in your washer depending on the size of the load, the hardness of your water, and how filthy your laundry is. If you have a water softener or soft water, probably only 1 pack is needed. I have noticed that this removes the laundry smells better (completely) if I mix the pack with hot water first then add that gallon of hot water/detergent to the FL machine on top of the clothes. Just something I noticed when comparing how I do the laundry at my parents' as opposed to when dad does it. Either way though, there has never been any discoloration to items or undissolved packs. It's is foolproof, cheap and effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great price. Great clean. Fresh smell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets Laundry clean ! Low amount of suds !
reviews.reviewText: I had to write a review about this wonderful detergent ! Of course , it’s easy to use because it’s in pod form but I like it because it gets my clothes clean and they smell fresh and it’s low in suds ! Don’t get me wrong , I like Tide for really dirty clothes but Tide makes a lot of suds for a regular wash and then my machine stops and the suds light comes on . Arm & Hammer is an old and trusted name . I am so happy I tried this detergent a couple of years ago . Because of the low suds , I don’t have to rinse my clothes on a second rinse to remove extra soap suds .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love My Arm & Hammer Power Paks
reviews.reviewText: My wife is one of those people who think only a certain brand of detergent will get clothes clean. She also prefers to use liquid detergent. To me the liquids are messy - a little always leaks out of the big bottles with the spigot and the cups have to be rinsed or thrown in with the laundry.So, I saw these on a deal at Amazon and thought I would give them a try. When they arrived she wondered why I dared to question her laundry expertise and try something else. Told her it was an experiment....and since I do my own laundry I prefer to do it my own way. Yes, that was quite bold on my part!!Long story short. these little Arm & Hammer Power Paks work exceedingly well. My big white bath sheets are even whiter than when they were when washed with her "Big T" brand detergent. I don't have to clean the detergent cup or clean up any little detergent dribbles off the top of the washer. On top of that, it is a lot cheaper, too.Now about those complaints that the Power Paks don't dissolve. I have used 30 of them and haven't once had that issue. Maybe it is possible but I think these must be some sort of operator error involved - overfilling perhaps? We have a front loading HE washer for reference - no problem for me to this point.By the way, the other day I was headed out to the garage and walked by the laundry room. I noticed that my wife had her hand in my bag of Arm & Hammer pouches. She was using my detergent! Perhaps she will become a convert after all.....at least we had a good laugh about her filching my "cheapo" laundry soap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but mighty
reviews.reviewText: They get the job done. It’s so simple to throw one in the laundry and keep it moving. If you’re one that wants to smell the detergent put two in there but one will actually clean your one regular size load…
Product was purchased for use by my college son.
Es un producto, que funciona perfecto para desmanchar ropa, la deja oliendo rico

Me gustó el producto como funciona en la ropa. La deja más limpia y libre de olores. Mi decepción que anuncian que son 97 paquetitos y recibí con 58 paquetes. Por ello le pongo 4 estrellas. Sin ningún descuento que observé en mi cuenta. No entrega lo anunciado. :(
